partintro.para: Config and Storage resources are responsible for injecting data into your applications and persisting data externally to your container.

Common resource types:
ConfigMaps
for providing text key value pairs injected into the application through environment variables, command line arguments, or files
Secrets
for providing binary data injected into the application through files
Volumes
for providing a filesystem external to the Container. Maybe shared across Containers within the same Pod and have a lifetime persisting beyond a Container or Pod.
